slides.title: Introducation
slides.content: This project focuses on developing an agent-based framework that enables users to perform a variety of tasks effectively.

slides.title: Key Features
slides.content:
- Provides functionalities for data manipulation and display.
- Integrates various agent capabilities for user interaction and task execution.

slides.title: Technologies Used
slides.content:
- Python for scripting and execution.
- Frameworks for interface and web interaction.

slides.title: Installation Instructions
slides.content:
1. Clone the repository from GitHub.
2. Ensure Python is installed.
3. Set up virtual environment (if needed).
4. Install dependencies from requirements.txt.
5. Execute the main program file to start using the agent.
